entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Agassiz
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:57 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 5.4°C
entry.summary:

Humidity: 92 %

Air Quality Health Index: 1
